/bin/sh -c mkdir /tmp/ucx &&     cd /tmp/ucx &&         wget -q https://github.com/openucx/ucx/releases/download/v1.9.0/ucx-1.9.0.tar.gz &&         tar zxf ucx-1.9.0.tar.gz && 	cd ucx-1.9.0 &&         ./configure --prefix=/usr/local --enable-optimizations --disable-assertions --disable-params-check --enable-mt &&         make -j $(nproc --all) &&         make install &&         rm -rf /tmp/ucx

/bin/sh -c mkdir /tmp/openmpi &&     cd /tmp/openmpi &&     wget https://download.open-mpi.org/release/open-mpi/v4.1/openmpi-${OPENMPI_VERSION}.tar.gz &&     tar zxf openmpi-${OPENMPI_VERSION}.tar.gz &&     cd openmpi-${OPENMPI_VERSION} &&     ./configure --with-ucx=/usr/local/ --enable-mca-no-build=btl-uct --enable-orterun-prefix-by-default &&     make -j $(nproc) all &&     make install &&     ldconfig &&     rm -rf /tmp/openmpi

/bin/sh -c apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y curl &&     curl https://packages.microsoft.com/keys/microsoft.asc | apt-key add - &&     curl https://packages.microsoft.com/config/ubuntu/20.04/prod.list > /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mssql-release.list &&     apt-get update &&     ACCEPT_EULA=Y apt-get install -y msodbcsql17 unixodbc-dev
